title: Curious Father Decodes His Unborn Son's DNA
teaser: Geneticist Razib Khan sequenced the entire genome of his unborn son. He tells NPR's Don Gonyea why he mapped the gene sequence and what he found: For instance, his son probably won't be a picky eater.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
